content: Is anybody who didn’t register for the official conference dinner interested in getting dinner tonight?
:pizza: or :spaghetti:?
Tbh, I’ve had one of those each night since Sunday.

If you want some non-pizza-or-pasta suggestions (obvs very incomplete):

  • Chaakoo Bombay Cafe (Indian, tapas style so you can try different things)
  • Swadish (also Indian, bit closer to campus, pretty fancy)
  • Stereo (Pub with nice food)
  • Drygate (Brewery with nice food)
  • West (Brewery at Glasgow Green with food)
  • Mezcal ("Mexican inspired")
